testcase.name: Prouser Submit a Claim as a owner
testcase.system-out: Given prouser logins into whiplash application..............................passed When prouser enter all mandatory details for claim creation as 'The driver' and 'YES' and 'NO'.passed Then claim is created for prouser...........................................passed

testcase.name: Compensator receives claim and claim liability sent to TPA
testcase.system-out: Given Claim is sent to the compensator.....................................passed When compensator receives claim and send to TPA.............................passed Then claims acceptance and liability decision is now sent to TPA............passed

testcase.name: TPA disputes causation and admits part liability
testcase.system-out: Given Login as TPA..........................................................passed When TPA accepts full liability.............................................passed Then claims acceptance and liability information is passed to claimant......passed

testcase.name: Claimant add losses and documents
testcase.system-out: Given claim liability is accepted...........................................passed When claimant update the losses from Loss Tile and upload documents.........passed Then claim will proceed to upload medical reports...........................passed

testcase.name: Prouser uploads medical Report with waitout prognosis
testcase.system-out: Given 'prouser' receives claim..............................................passed When prouser uploads the medical report with waitout prognosis 'Pending-Medical' and decides to waitout.passed Then report is uploaded and sent to compensator.............................passed

testcase.name: Prouser indicates completion of wait out period and upload new report
testcase.system-out: Given 'prouser' receives claim..............................................passed When claimant indicates completion of waitout period and upload new report..passed Then report is uploaded and sent to compensator.............................passed

testcase.name: Prouser rejects the first offer to Compensator
testcase.system-out: Given 'prouser' receives the offer..........................................passed When 'prouser' reject the offer.............................................passed Then counter offer is sent for revision.....................................passed

testcase.name: TPA reject claimant counter offer and makes new offer(Second offer)
Prouser rejects the Second offer to Compensator
testcase.system-out: Given 'prouser' receives the offer..........................................passed When 'prouser' reject the offer.............................................passed Then counter offer is sent for revision.....................................passed

testcase.name: Compensator reject claimant counter offer and makes new offer(third offer)
Prouser rejects offer and goes to court
testcase.system-out: Given 'prouser' receives new offer..........................................passed When 'prouser' decides to go to court after rejecting offer.................passed Then counter offer is sent for revision.....................................passed

testcase.name: Prouser goes to court and answer NVC
testcase.system-out: Given 'prouser' decided to go to court......................................passed When 'prouser' answers NVC questions........................................passed Then claim will be sent to compensator to review nvc answers................passed

testcase.name: TPA agrees the nvc selection
testcase.system-out: Given TPA receives claim to review NVC answers..............................passed When TPA responds to NVC answers............................................passed Then claim should be sent to claimant to select documents for court.........passed

testcase.name: prouser Claimant selects documents for court
testcase.system-out: Given Compensator responds NVC answers to 'prouser'.........................passed When 'prouser' selects documents for court after NVC........................passed Then documents should be reviewed by Compensator............................passed

testcase.name: TPA acknowledges documents selected for court
testcase.system-out: Given claimant selects court documents TPA..................................passed When TPA agrees to court documents when claim is in 'Pending-OfferListReview'.passed Then claim is sent to claimant..............................................passed

testcase.name: prouser Claimant acknowledges TPA doc selection and case is resolved
testcase.system-out: Given 'prouser' checks the documents uploaded by Compensator................passed When prouser submit the claim for NVC court and select witness at 'Pending-OfferListAccept'.passed Then case is closed at court stage..........................................passed

testcase.name: The claim is moved to 'Resolved-CourtOffer'
testcase.system-out: Given 'prouser' goes to court...............................................passed When prouser claim goes to dispute at court at 'Resolved-CourtOffer'........passed Then the claim will be resolved at court....................................passed
